nodes.text: During the early days of the Jedi Order, the fallen Jedi Master Rajivari assembled a group of followers, who participated in his attempts to reshape the Order under Rajivari's set of principles. The followers were defeated by the Jedi Order during the Siege of Kaleth, while their master abandoned them and retreated into the Fount of Rajivari. The Twi'lek female Vadria Tallion and Human males Orth Quane and Cahel Tse were members of Rajivari's faction.
